target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Teaming Administration portlet on the initial Liferay portal window, click the plus sign (+) to the left of Form and view designers to expand this section and view the available designers. To add the Teaming Administration portlet to the Liferay portal window, click the Add Content link in the upper right corner. This brings up a panel of portlets along the left margin. Expand the Teaming section to add more Novell Teaming features, such as the Teaming Administration portlet.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Teaming Administration portlet on the initial Liferay portal window, click the plus sign (+) to the left of Form and view designers to expand this section and view the available designers. To add the Teaming Administration portlet to the Liferay portal window, click the Add Content link in the upper right corner. This brings up a panel of portlets along the left margin. Expand the Teaming section to add more Novell Teaming features, such as the Teaming Administration portlet.

target.name: Step
target.text: Expand Workflow process and click State - Review.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the options dialog on the right, click Add.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type the Question text (Do you approve of this request?) and the Data name (approve_request), then click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type the Data name (approve_request_yes) and the Response text (Yes), then click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat Step 9 through Step 12 to add a "No" response to this Workflow question.

target.name: Step
target.text: Expand Workflow process, expand State - Review, then click Transitions.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the __transition_on_question field, type in the Data name for your Workflow question (approve_request).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Transition on response field, type the Data name for your Workflow response (approve_request_yes).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the To State drop-down list, select the state to which you are transitioning (Approve).

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat this procedure to add a Transition on response for the "No" Workflow response (approve_request_no) that transitions to the Deny state.

target.name: Step
target.text: Expand Workflow process, expand State - Review, expand Transitions, then click the first Manual transition.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the options dialog on the right, click Delete.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the confirmation dialog that appears, click OK to delete the Manual transition.

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat this procedure to delete the remaining Manual transition for the Review state.
